channel.title: Logistic Regression on Anything Data
channel.description: Recent content in Logistic Regression on Anything Data

item.title: Linear Classification Models - Hepatic Dataset
item.description: This post is following exercise 1 in Chapter 12 of Applied Predicative Modeling. Here I use the machine learning package CARET in R to make classification models; in particular, the linear classification models discussed in Chapter 12. The dataset in question is about hepatic injury (liver damage). It includes a dataframe of biological related predictors of liver damage bio, a dataframe of chemical related predictors chem, and the response variable we are interested in, injury.
